info.title: Google Sheets
info.description: Connect to Google Sheets to manage your spreadsheets. You can create, edit, and collaborate with others on spreadsheets.

get.description: Retrieves file metadata from Google Drive using id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file

put.description: Updates a file in Google Drive

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to update

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Content of the file to upload to Google Drive

delete.description: Deletes a file from Google Drive

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the file to delete

get.description: Retrieves file metadata from Google Drive using path

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path of the file in Google Drive

get.description: Retrieves file content from Google Drive using path

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path of the file in Google Drive

get.description: Retrieves file content from Google Drive using id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the file to retrieve in Google Drive

post.description: Uploads a file to Google Drive

parameters.name: folderPath
parameters.description: Folder path to upload the file to Google Drive

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the file to create in Google Drive

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Content of the file to upload to Google Drive

post.description: Copies a file on Google Drive

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Url to source file

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Destination file path in Google Drive, including target filename

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Overwrites the destination file if set to 'true

get.description: List files in a Google Drive folder

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the folder in Google Drive

get.description: Lists files in the Google Drive root folder

post.description: Extracts an archive file into a folder in Google Drive (example: .zip)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Path to the archive file

parameters.name: destination
parameters.description: Path in Google Drive to extract the archive contents

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: Overwrites the destination files if set to 'true

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Specify the file

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Specify the worksheet

get.description: Retrieves sheet names from a Google Sheet file

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Specify the file

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = 256)

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip (default = 0)

get.description: This operation retrieves the records from a specific Google Sheet.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Pick the file.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Pick a worksheet.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = 256).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of entries to skip (default = 0).

post.description: This operation is used to insert a new row in a Google Sheet.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Pick a file.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Pick a worksheet.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row to insert into the specified sheet.

get.description: This operation retrieves a single row from a Google Sheet.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Pick a file.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Pick a worksheet.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to retrieve.

delete.description: This operation is used to retrieve a row from a Google Sheet.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Pick a file.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Pick a worksheet.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to delete.

patch.description: This operation updates a row in a Google Sheet.

parameters.name: dataset
parameters.description: Pick a file.

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Pick a worksheet.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to update.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row with updated values.

TablesList.description: List of one or multiple tables.

Item.description: Data pertaining to a single record or row in your Google Sheet.

ItemsList.description: List of one or multiple records.
